articles.author: Jamie Dettmer
articles.title: Zelenskyy has no choice but to ask his fighters to hold Bakhmut — for now - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: US generals say the Ukrainian president is right not to disengage from the meat-grinder of a battle.
articles.content:
Jamie Dettmer is opinion editor at POLITICO Europe.
French emperor Napoleon Bonaparte was famously averse to retreating. However skillfully effected a retreat may be, it always lessens the morale of… [+7418 chars]
